preferences: Prefer project-scope skill installs; do not install for all agents by default.
fixes: When a skill targets pkbllm canonical sources, never hand-edit `skills/`; update canonical and regenerate the mirror.
pitfalls: Do not commit raw run artifacts under any `hands_on/**/results/`; keep only small excerpts under `evidence/`.
verification: Run the smallest possible smoke command first and capture exact output into `evidence/`.
